title.native: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー ROAD TO THE TOP
title.romaji: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby - ROAD TO THE TOP

description:
The new anime will depict T.M. Opera O, Admire Vega, Narita Top Road, and other Uma Musume (Horse Girls) going head-to-head to win Classic competitions.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Road to the Top
ウマ娘ロードトゥーザトップ

tags.name: Athletics
tags.description: Centers around sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, or walking.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Astronomy
tags.description: Relating or centered around the study of celestial objects and phenomena, space, or the universe.

title.native: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー Season 2

ウマ娘 プリティーダービー 新時代の扉

alternative: Conqueror of the end of the Century

node.description:
[Website](https://www.cygames.co.jp)

Cygames, Inc. is a Japanese video game development studio established in 2011 by CyberAgent, Inc.
In 2016 Cygames announced the establishment of an anime studio [CygamesPictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6182/). The company also began funding anime for its mobile property and for new projects and adaptations for anime. The company also entered the manga, music and design market in the time period.
Kimura Kashiko is an editor working for Mad Box.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/990312056)

Originating from Studio Giants' in-between department, Studio Lions.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/liaochengzhi222)

Started off as a composite artist at [Doga Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/95/).
